name: @paulohenriquevn/m2js
description: Transform TypeScript/JavaScript code into LLM-friendly Markdown summaries + Smart Dead Code Detection. Extract exported functions, classes, and JSDoc comments for better AI context with 60%+ token reduction. Intelligent dead code removal with confidence levels and risk assessment.

scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm link && m2js examples/User.ts --output test-integration.md && m2js tests/fixtures/dead-exports --detect-unused && echo 'Integration test passed'
scripts.benchmark: npm run build && npm link && echo 'Running performance benchmarks...' && time m2js examples/User.ts --output benchmark.md && time m2js tests/fixtures/dead-exports --detect-unused
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security
scripts.ci: npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run build && npm run test:integration
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'm2js installed! Try: m2js --help or m2js --help-dead-code'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: M2JS Contributors
